quotes.quote: A man in love is not complete until he is married. Then he is finished.
An archeologist is the best husband any woman can have; the older she gets, the more interested he is in her.
Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
Love is a lot like a backache, it doesn't show up on X-rays, but you know it's there.
Romantic love is mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one.
A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
I love you no matter what you do, but do you have to do so much of it?
True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
Love is blind but marriage is a real eye-opener
Love doesn't drop on you unexpectedly; you have to give off signals, sort of like an amateur radio operator.
I had a dream that i still loved you...I think I woke up screaming.
It wasn't love at first sight. It took a full five minutes.

I love you so much I'd fight a bear for you. Well not a grizzly bear because they have claws, and not a panda bear because they know Kung Fu... But a care bear, I'd definitely fight a care bear for you.
If you text 'I love you' to a person and the person writes back an emoji - no matter what that emoji is, they don't love you back.
I almost had a psychic girlfriend but she left me before we met.
Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
Love is an ocean of emotions entirely surrounded by expenses.
I love you more than coffee, but please don't make me prove it.
All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
If you love 'em in the morning with their eyes full of crust; if you love 'em at night with their hair full of rollers, chances are, you're in love.
You can't put a price tag on love. But if you could, I'd wait for it to go on sale.
In any perfect relationship men should remember it's a matter of direction; she takes what's right and you take what's left.
Love is not having to hold in your farts anymore.
My wife and I were happy for 20 years – then we met.
Love is a sweet dream and marriage is the alarm clock.
Love is much nicer to be in than an automobile accident, a tight girdle, a higher tax bracket or a holding pattern over Philadelphia.
Love is an electric blanket with somebody else in control of the switch.
True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
If only one could tell true love from false love as one can tell mushrooms from toadstools.
In love, somehow, a man's heart is always either exceeding the speed limit, or getting parked in the wrong place.
Honesty is the key to a relationship. If you can fake that, you're in.
In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
Love is like a tornado, picks you up off your feet and sometimes takes half your house.
If love is the answer, could you rephrase the question?
Love thy neighbor, just watch out for the husband
Love is the only kind of fire which is never covered by insurance.
Love is fun but, it is not going to pay the bills.
A man falls in love through his eyes, a woman through her ears
People should fall in love with their eyes closed.
My phone battery lasts longer than most of my relationships nowadays.
If she happens to fall, I'll be there to laugh at first and then help her up afterwards.
The four most important words in any marriage...I'll do the dishes.
My last love is just like that thong peter griffin borrowed from me... Never getting it back.
Love is like finding a needle in a hay stack!
We're like Romeo & Juliet.. Except for the dying part of course.
They say that love is more important than money, but have you ever tried to pay your bills with a hug?
The more she turned right the more I turned wrong.
I was nauseous and tingly all over. I was either in love or I had smallpox.
Love is a temporary insanity curable by marriage.
Love conquers all things--expect poverty and toothache.
Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.
Love is blind, but marriage restores its sight.
Love is a kind of military service.
Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
Oh, how absurd and delicious it is in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it--no life can be complete without it.
If it is your time, love will track you down life a cruse missile.
To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
Being in love with yourself means never having to say you're got a headache.
A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
I've been in love with the same woman for 41 years. If my wife ever finds out, she'll kill me!
Some people claim that marriage interferes with romance. There's no doubt about it. Anytime you have a romance, your wife is bound to interfere.
I love mankind... It's people I can't stand.
I never loved another person the way I loved myself.
But love is not fashionable any more, the poets have killed it. They wrote so much about it that nobody believed them.
The world's tragedy is that men love women, women love children, and children love hamsters.
My husband and I fell in love at first sight. Maybe I should have taken a second look.
Love is an exploding cigar that you willingly smoke.
Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
If you never want to see a man again, just tell him 'I love you. I want to marry you. I want to have children.' They leave skid marks.
Every love's the love before in a duller dress.
Love is not the dying moan of a distant violin--it's the triumphant twang of a bedspring.
There's only one kind of love that lasts--unrequited love. It stays with you forever.
Love is something sent from heaven to worry the hell out of you.
Those who are faithful know only the trivial side of love; it is the faithless who know love's tragedies.
Love was only the dirty trick nature played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
I believe in love and marriage, but not necessarily with the same person.
Love is the delightful interval between meeting a beautiful girl and discovering that she looks like a haddock.
Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
Love is like quicksilver in the hand...Leave the fingers open and it stays in the palm. Clutch it, and it darts away.
There is always something ridiculous about the passions of people whom one has ceased to love.
Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
Many man has fallen in love with a girl in a light so dim he would not have chosen a suit by lit.
Love. Of course, love. Flames for a year, ashes for 30.
Love is not merely blind but mentally afflicted.
Men always want to be a woman's first love...what (women) like is to be a man's last romance.
My wife and I thought we were in love--but it turned out to be benign.
Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
I had rather hear my dog bark at a crow, than a man swear he loves my.
Love is the history of a woman's life; it is but an episode in a man's.
Love is like any other luxury. You have no right to it unless you can afford it.
When one is in love one begins by deceiving one's self. And one ends by deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
The best love affairs are those we never had.
Love for me is like a pretzel. Twisted and salty.
Love is the delusion that one woman differs from another.
A man falls in love through his eyes, a woman through her ears.
The fickleness of the women I love is only equaled by the infernal constancy of the women who love me.
Love us the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
Nothing takes the taste out peanut butter quite life unrequited love.
They say love's like the measles--all the worse when it comes late in life.
How alike are the groans of love to those of the dying.
When love is not madness, it is not love.
A girl must marry for love, and keep on marrying until she finds it.
I had some words with my wife, and she had some paragraphs with me.
My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
